text: Ezɨ enselɨn igharazim iza ofa gamir danganim boroghɨn tughav iti. A golɨn mɨner mamɨn suira, mɨner kam, me an aven paura tuazɨ a isia mɨgharir mughuriar aghuim oto. Ezɨ me pauran avɨrir maba a ganɨngi, eghtɨ a Godɨn gumazamizibar azangsɨzibar sara isafuragh, egh atrivir dabirabimɨn guamɨn mangɨva golɨn ofa gamir danganimɨn God bagh ofa damuam.
